title: The Big Suey: Mike Ryan's Top 5 Grudges
description:
An impossibly petty story of a man leaving bags of poop at the gravesite of his ex-wife leads us straight to Mike Ryan's Top 5 longest served grudges. Then, Ethan Strauss joins Dan and Stu to discuss Adrian Wojnarowski, his reporting on the Ime Udoka scandal, and how much of Woj's work is through a specific agency filter.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
